# Request for Proposal - Civil Construction Services for Parliamentary Precinct
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified service providers for the provision of civil construction and repair services at the Parliamentary Precinct.

## Request Details
* Reference Number: WS4587703071
* Solicitation Number: WS4587703071
* Publication Date: May 16, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 25, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: June 24, 2026

## Procurement Details
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: The proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

## Service Requirements
PSPC requires civil construction and repair services for all assets within the Parliamentary Precinct as and when required. The resulting contract will be for a period of 2 years with up to 3 additional one-year option periods.

## Additional Information
* The contract will be awarded to the service provider that submits the best overall proposal based on the evaluation criteria.
* The service provider will be responsible for conducting work safely, efficiently, and in accordance with PSPC's policies and procedures.
* The contract will be managed through SAP Ariba.

## Contact Information
* Contact Person: Robert Angell (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Online Access
To view the full Request for Proposal and access the bidding details, please visit the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19726767?extsite=MTk3MjY3NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please ensure all queries are directed to the contact person listed above. Do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
